titleStmt.title: A testimony of the appearance of God in the spirit of power and the true light, making manifest the deceipts of the Serpent with some reasons why Margaret Hambleton doth deny the Presbyterians of Scotland, they being found in the steps of the false prophets.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Alexander, 1628-1689.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
